name: 10 Mega Hits
overview: 10 Mega Hits is a compilation including the following ten games: TAPE A GAME 1: 3D Starstrike GAME 2: Blue Thunder GAME 3: Son of Blagger GAME 4: Automania GAME 5: Bugaboo (The Flea) TAPE B GAME 1: Psytron GAME 2: Wheelie GAME 3: The Fall Guy GAME 4: Blade Alley GAME 5: Penetrator
